function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High contact services operating during a total lockdown","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and reduce physical contact","Technologies":"Online booking systems, contactless payments, and video consultations","People":"Customers, employees, and local community","Owner":"Service providers and government authorities"},{"Description":"Development of online communities for hair salons","Impact":"Potential spread of misinformation and unreliable advice","Mitigation":"Moderation and fact-checking of community content","Technologies":"Online forums, social media platforms, and community management tools","People":"Customers, service providers, and community members","Owner":"Service providers and community moderators"},{"Description":"Small family-run businesses without resources to develop online presence","Impact":"Limited ability to adapt to digital platforms and reach customers online","Mitigation":"Collaborate with local communities and universities for support and resources","Technologies":"Social media platforms, online collaboration tools, and digital marketing strategies","People":"Small business owners, employees, and local community","Owner":"Community organizations and business support initiatives"}]}
